name: Shiba Classic
description: Enter the dungeon of $SHIBA CLASSIC, the original Doge killer that became known as a significant player in the meme dog arena. Inspired by the classic Shiba Inu logo of 2021, $SHIBC represents Shiba’s legacy; it embodies a community united by a shared vision of decentralization and innovation. Join us in reviving the essence of the Shiba phenomenon. Enter the dungeon of $SHIBA CLASSIC, the original Doge killer that became known as a significant player in the meme dog arena. Inspired by the classic Shiba Inu logo of 2021, $SHIBC represents Shiba’s legacy; it embodies a community united by a shared vision of decentralization and innovation. Join us in reviving the essence of the Shiba phenomenon.
